intro: The legendary chicken hunt returns with a snowy twist! Dive into 90 seconds of fast-paced fun, secrets, and laughs. Perfect for players of all ages! Enjoy
description:
Moorhuhn Winter Edition – Let the Feathers Fly!

A Blizzard of Fun Awaits!
Join the iconic crazy chicken in a hilarious arcade shooting adventure set in a whimsical winter wonderland. Whether you're a longtime fan or a first-time hunter, the addictive gameplay will have you hooked in no time.

Shoot, Score, Repeat!
Your mission is simple: rack up as many points as you can in 90 seconds by shooting the zany chickens that pop up all over the screen. It’s the perfect pick-up-and-play experience — great for quick gaming sessions on the go or cozy evenings at home.

Secrets Beneath the Snow
The snowy landscape isn’t just for show! Blast away at quirky objects to uncover hidden bonuses, trigger laugh-out-loud chain reactions, and solve playful puzzles. With intuitive controls, anyone can jump in and start hunting.

Nostalgia Meets New High Scores
Whether you're reliving the classic chaos or discovering the joy of Moorhuhn for the first time, this winter edition delivers pure, lighthearted fun that keeps you coming back for more.

Highlights:
● FRANTIC WINTER HUNTING – Dive into 90-second rounds of shoot-em-up madness in a charming winter world. Simple to play, tough to master!
● SECRETS & PUZZLES GALORE – Explore the interactive landscape to uncover hidden targets, trigger comical reactions, and boost your score.
● CLIMB THE LEADERBOARDS – Compete with friends and players worldwide to become the ultimate chicken hunter!

Moorhuhn speaks English, Brazilian Portuguese, Chinese (Simplified), Chinese (Traditional), Czech, Dutch, European Portuguese, French, German, Hungarian, Indonesian, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Russian, Spanish, Swedish, Turkish, and Ukrainian.
